name: Anna
comment: I love this post! I've always been fascinated by the meaning of dreams and this post really helped me understand the different perspectives on the topic. I especially liked the idea of dreams as fictional memories. It's so true that dreams can be meaningful even when they're made of arbitrary brain activity.

replies.name: John
replies.comment: I agree with you, Anna. Dreams can be meaningful even when they're made of arbitrary brain activity. I also like the idea of dreams as a storytelling machine. It's so true that dreams can be meaningful even when they're made of arbitrary brain activity.
